name: OpenCode
description: Installs OpenCode AI coding agent with optional server mode for remote connections. Supports both native installer and npm.

installMethod.description: Installation method. 'native' uses official curl installer, 'npm' installs opencode-ai package

enableServer.description: Automatically start OpenCode server on container start for remote access

serverHostname.description: WARNING: Defaults to '0.0.0.0' (network-accessible). Set serverPassword for security, or use '127.0.0.1' for localhost-only access.

serverPassword.description: Password for OpenCode server authentication (recommended when exposing to network)

enableMdns.description: Enable mDNS service discovery (advertises as opencode.local on network)

enableWebMode.description: Start with web interface instead of headless server mode

corsOrigins.description: Comma-separated list of additional CORS origins (e.g., 'http://localhost:3000,https://app.example.com')

plugins.description: Comma separated list of npm plugins to install (e.g. opencode-gemini-auth)
